item.description: Come have fun at the Trinity Brew House playing trivia! Enjoy any combination of eating, drinking, playing, watching, and talking. There's a great host, good music, and fun times. It's located in the bottom level of the Trinity Brew House. We've really enjoyed the brave, new members that have been coming...so keep it up!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the basement of the Brew House, look for a tiny meetup sign!
item.name: Trivia Goes On...
